name: spoonacularfoodutilities
0:
”Alexa, ask spoonacular how many calories are in two cups of milk”
”Alexa, ask spoonacular for a substitute for butter”
”Alexa, ask spoonacular what is on my meal plan for lunch tomorrow”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: spoonacular
Developer Terms of Use
des: For the meal planning and shopping list skills you need a free account on spoonacular.com. All the other skills like retrieving nutritional information, converting amounts, getting ingredient replacement tips, and listening to trivia and jokes is not attached to an account.
